thread.title: Happy New
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Happy New Customer

author: Happy New Customer
title: Happy New
text: I'm much happier with White Mountain Puzzles than the larger puzzle companies I've tried before. Their puzzles are well priced and beautiful when finished. They have a large variety of subjects. The puzzle pieces are slightly larger than standard for high count puzzles. That makes them more fun to put together. Best of all, White Mountain sends frequent updates about the status of your order and they deliver as promised.
